title: Settlement west of the Appalachians - cause

content.prompt: In the eighteenth century, British colonists wishing to settle west of the Appalachians were principally motivated by

choices.label: the comparatively small numbers of American Indians in the old Northwest
the low price and easy availability of land
freedom from the threat of Spanish authorities
a desire to escape overcrowded cities along the Atlantic coast
promises of tax breaks for those willing to establish frontier settlements

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
